definitions.definition: A cutter , consisting of a blade in either knife form or disk form, attached to the ploughbeam of a plough to cut the sward , in front of the ploughshare and mouldboard .
The part of a seed drill that makes the furrow for the seed.

main_definition: A cutter , consisting of a blade in either knife form or disk form, attached to the ploughbeam of a plough to cut the sward , in front of the ploughshare and mouldboard .
secondary_definitions: ( British ) The part of a seed drill that makes the furrow for the seed.
